com.opendxl.databus.common.internal.builder

Class TopicNameBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.opendxl.databus.common.internal.builder.TopicNameBuilder

  • public final class TopicNameBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    It is a helper class to compose topic names. A Databus topic is made up by a topic name and a tenant group name

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Gets the tenant group.

      Gets topic name and tenant group composed by topicname-tenantgroup.
      static java.lang.String getTopicName(java.lang.String topic, java.lang.String tenantGroup)
      Compose a Kafka topic name based on group and topic.

    • Method Detail

      • getTopicName

        public static java.lang.String getTopicName(java.lang.String topic,
                                            java.lang.String tenantGroup)
        Compose a Kafka topic name based on group and topic.
        Parameters:
        topic - topic name.
        tenantGroup - tenant group name.
        Returns:

      • getTopicFromComposedTopicName

        public static java.lang.String getTopicFromComposedTopicName(java.lang.String composedTopicName)
        Gets topic name and tenant group composed by topicname-tenantgroup.
        Parameters:
        composedTopicName - A topic name composed by topic and tenant group.
        Returns:
        Topic name without a tenant group.
